review: As a 66 year old Grandma getting ready to retire, I  decided to  get rid of my very expensive cable TV  and land line phone and just stay with  WiFi  and my cell phone. So I  purchased  the Fire Stick.So far, it is working, after I  had to purchase  a "smart" TV. My other TV was only 3 years old, but was not WiFi  compatible. I  am still learning my way around the apps, etc.I  think I  will enjoy it, once I get use to it.
author: Alice

review: so far, it's working wonderfully!  I love all the apps you are able to use through it.  It's nicer than having to use an additional HDMI cord to connect my computer to my tv to do the same stuff the Fire Stick can do!!

review: This thing exceeded my expectations. I dislike that I cannot use it to watch The Game of Thrones but that is entirely a HBO issue. The stick works extremely well. It is user friendly. Thank you Amazon. Well done. I would recommend this item to anyone.
